title: Drawing, "Virgin in Glory with St. Peter and St. Paul", ca. 1715
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, black chalk on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Painted architecture for a fresco above and arch.  Two angels support a framed picture of the ascension of the Virgin.  Below sitting: St. Peter and St. Paul.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Virgin in Glory with St. Peter and St. Paul", ca. 1715.
ca. 1715. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, black chalk on paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7278.
